mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER ( USER_ID, PASSWORD, NAME, BIRTHDATE, HP, EMAIL, ADDRESS_ZIPCODE, ADDRESS_ROAD, ADDRESS_JIBUN, ADDRESS_NAMUJI ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birthDate}, #{hp}, #{email}, #{addressZipcode}, #{addressRoad}, #{addressJibun}, #{addressNamuji} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, PASSWORD FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
